member.name: P:MEME.HttpInternal.HttpProcessor.http_url
member.summary: File location or GET/POST request arguments

member.name: M:MEME.HttpInternal.HttpProcessor.HandlePOSTRequest
member.summary: This post data processing just reads everything into a memory stream. this is fine for smallish things, but for large stuff we should really hand an input stream to the request processor. However, the input stream we hand him needs to let him see the "end of the stream" at this content length, because otherwise he won't know when he's seen it all!
